chain.description: Name of the chain (e.g. iotex, ethereum )

network.description: Name of the network (e.g. mainnet, testnet )

provider.description: Name of the provider (e.g. casimir, infura, alchemy)

address.description: The address that initiated the event

to_address.description: The address which received the action event

candidate.description: The name of the candidate associated the event

candidate_list.description: The list of candidates in a stake action

amount.description: The amount of the currency in the event

payload.description: The payload associated with the event
